
{{alias}}( x, value )
    Tests if an array contains a provided search value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ArrayLikeObject
        Input array.

    value: any
        Search value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: boolean
        Boolean indicating if an array contains a search value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( [ 1, 2, 3 ], 2 )
    true

    See Also
    --------
